snippet: Photographs of the True School NYC Summer Park Jam, a weekly series of family-friendly outdoor gatherings that celebrate the most essential element of hip-hop culture: the D.J.
abstract: Photographer Todd Heisler captures images of True School NYC Summer Park Jam, weekly series of family-friendly outdoor gatherings held at locations in Bronx and Harlem; event highlights the DJ, most essential element of hip-hop culture.
lead_paragraph: Photographs of the True School NYC Summer Park Jam, a weekly series of family-friendly outdoor gatherings that celebrate the most essential element of hip-hop culture: the D.J.
